snippet.title: Monster Arena Official trailer
snippet.description:
From the creator of Shop Empire, and Monster Corp, here comes another fantasy games.
Little Giant Studio "Monster Arena", choose and train your monster to become Monster Arena's master, raise and explore over many item, skill tree, etc.

visit our site www.littlegiantworld.com to games up your day!

Sponsored by http://www.GamePirate.com
Support us, buy our merchandise here: http://rdbl.co/1sAqoSs

Don't forget to visit our facebook page:
http://www.facebook.com/Littlegiantworld
